page.title: 01MY VALLEY
page.content: MY VALLEY IS RECOVERING THE GREEN LANDSCAPE IT HAD BEFORE COAL WAS DISCOVERED OVER A CENTURY AGO.CONIFERS HAVE REPLACED MUCH OF THE ORIGINAL VEGETATION(DECIDUOUS TREES,FERNS AND GRASSLAND).COAL TIPS HAVE BEEN REMOVED AND LANDSCAPED SO MUCH OF THE MINING SCARS ARE NOW DISAPPEARING. THE STEEP SIDES OF THE VALLEY AND THE NEED TO BUILD HOUSES QUICKLY AND CHEAPLY LED TO THE BUILDING OF HOUSES IN TERRACES ALONG THE SIDES OF THE VALLEY.(LINEAR OR RIBBON-PATTERN).THE HOUSES WERE BUILT OF LOCAL PENNANT SANDSTONE,WITH SLATE ROOFS.THE LATTER ARE NOW BEING REPLACED WITH COLOURED TILES AND HOUSES MODERNISED. THE VALLEY WIDENS AT TREORCHY WHERE THERE IS A SETTLEMENT OF 7,632 PEOPLE.THE MAIN SHOPPING AREA AND OTHER FACILITIES ARE CONCENTRATED IN THIS AREA.
